translation.en: [Shawn Mendes] You first get on the stage, and ego comes rushing in.
translation.de: Du trittst auf die Bühne, und dein Ego schaltet sich ein.

translation.en: And it goes, "Don't mess up,
'cause you're the man. Everyone's saying you're the man, so don't mess up."
translation.de: Alle sagen, du hast es drauf, also vermassle es nicht."

translation.en: So you get to the mic, and your first note is flat. [chuckles] Always.
translation.de: Du gehst ans Mikro, und dein erster Ton ist schief, immer.

translation.en: And then about 30 seconds in, you go...
"Oh, yeah, I'm just a guy and I love music."
translation.de: "Ich bin nur ein Kerl, der Musik liebt."

translation.en: And your whole body releases.
And I just let go and I look around, and I'm just like...
translation.de: Ich lasse los, sehe mich um und denke:

translation.en: "Just do this.
Drop the ego.
Time to surrender."
[automated female voice] Ever since I was about ten years old,
I was obsessed with being really good at things.
translation.de: wollte ich alles, was ich tat, besonders gut machen.

translation.en: That my worth is based on what I do.
translation.de: Ich dachte, mein Selbstwert hänge davon ab.

translation.en: And that can lead to a dark place.
My voice hit its breaking point at the end of this tour,
translation.de: Meine Stimme verließ mich zum Ende dieser Tour,

translation.en: -and I'm using my phone to talk. -[playing melody]
translation.de: darum spreche ich durch mein Handy.

translation.en: Last night reminded me...
I'm not invincible.
♪ Say whoa-oh-oh ♪
Sing!
Louder!
Scream it!
No matter how fast I get, do not stop clapping, all right?
translation.de: Egal, wie schnell ich werde, klatscht weiter.

translation.en: Here we go! Clap those hands! Clap!
Faster!
Faster!
Faster!
-[man] Hey, uh, good one. -[Shawn] Thank you, brother.
Give us a hug.
-Thank you so much. -[man 1] Let's go. Let's motor up.
[woman] You're gonna make a left when you come out
translation.de: Fahr links, wenn du draußen bist

translation.en: and go through the lights.
-[Shawn] Thank you. Thank you. -[woman 1] Bye!
[woman 2] I love you! I love you!
[man 2] Just keep an eye... I can't see the monitor... So just keep an eye on the recording.
translation.de: Ich sehe den Kameramonitor nicht. Behalt die Aufnahme im Auge.

translation.en: Hey, Cez, Jocelyn's gonna come. I told her to be here for 11:50.
translation.de: Hey, Cez, Jocelyn kommt. Ich sagte ihr 11.50 Uhr.

translation.en: [man] All right.
[male interviewer] So, this thing you start doing in your bedroom,
translation.de: Du hast in deinem Zimmer angefangen,

translation.en: making Vines for the love of it...
Is it hard to protect that pure thing that started it all?
translation.de: Ist es schwer, die Unschuld dahinter zu wahren?

translation.en: [Karen Mendes] Come on, Shawn, let's go! Time to go in!
Get up.
[Shawn] As a kid, when you look at someone and you're like, "This is my dream..."
translation.de: Wenn man als Kind gesagt bekommt…

translation.en: And someone goes, "That's a stupid dream,"
you'd be like, "Oh, yeah, it is a stupid dream."
translation.de: fängt man an, es zu glauben.

translation.en: When I got into school...
translation.de: Als ich in die Schule kam…

translation.en: Ms. Parker, she was the vocal class teacher,
and I told her, "I want to be a singer.
I want to be... I want to be an artist." You know?
And she had no hesitation to believe me.
My parents, my friends...
Nobody looked at me and said, "You're crazy."
Everybody was like, "Go for it."
[Manny] He sounds better all the time now.
With more practice like he's had...
[Karen] Hey!
-We love you, Shawn Mendes! -I'm excited!
[Manny] This is larger than I thought.
[man] Yeah.
-[man] Can he hear it? -No. No, no. Nothing can be heard.
[Manny] He may not like being filmed. He's saying hello.
-Hi. -[Shawn] He can't be filmed.
-[Manny] This ain't going anywhere. -Okay.
Hey, Mom?
What do you say now?
It is nuts.
What, even to go to the bathroom, he has to go with security.
translation.de: Er geht selbst mit Security aufs Klo.

translation.en: [woman] Oh, my God!
Oh, my God!
I love you!
[Manny] Did you see that?
-"I love you"? Holy moly. -[Karen laughs]
[women cheering] Hi!
-You're not embarrassed of what? -I'm nervous now.
translation.de: Bist du nervös? Jetzt bin ich nervös. Bislang nicht.

translation.en: I wasn't nervous until now.
translation.de: Jetzt bin ich nervös. Bislang nicht.

translation.en: Can we go back there?
[Manny] Hold on. Stay with me.
-[man] Give it up for Shawn Mendes! -[audience cheering]
Do I have anyone from outside of Ontario?
-Where are you guys from? -Michigan.
Michigan!
Holy...
Crazy.
I think I'd heard A Great Big World, "Say Something" for the first time,
translation.de: Ich hörte "Say Something" von A Great Big World zum ersten Mal,

translation.en: and I was like, "Wow, that's a really great song."
translation.de: dachte, es sei ein toller Song,

translation.en: Googled it...
and one of the first search results was Shawn's cover of the song.
translation.de: …und eins der ersten Suchergebnisse war Shawns Cover.

translation.en: [Gertler] I was taken aback a bit. It was like, "This is really incredible."
translation.de: Ich war verblüfft. Ich dachte: "Das ist unglaublich."

translation.en: Reached out, and we FaceTimed Shawn and his mom.
translation.de: Ich nahm Kontakt auf und sprach mit Shawn und seiner Mutter.

translation.en: Immediately, Shawn just starts grilling us with questions
about how the music business works, why he might need a manager.
translation.de: über das Musikgeschäft, wozu er einen Manager brauche…

translation.en: I just said to them, I was honest,
"I don't know everything, but I'm going to sit here
translation.de: "Ich weiß nicht alles, aber ich werde dir

translation.en: and spend every minute of my time figuring it out with you."
[Shawn] I would always say to him, "I need to get a band
translation.de: Ich sagte ihm immer: "Ich brauche eine Band. Alleine klinge ich nicht gut."

translation.en: 'cause I'll sound bad on my own," and he'd say, "No.
translation.de: "Ich brauche eine Band. Alleine klinge ich nicht gut." Er sagte: "Geh einfach auf die Bühne, du und die Gitarre."

translation.en: Just get on the stage, just you and the guitar."
translation.de: Er sagte: "Geh einfach auf die Bühne, du und die Gitarre."

translation.en: Having the confidence
was all based off of those first couple years of performing with just a guitar.
translation.de: Mein Selbstvertrauen verdanke ich diesen ersten Jahren.

translation.en: I went from a small bedroom in Pickering
to playing in front of a few thousand people in a couple years.
translation.de: wurden in wenigen Jahren Konzerte vor Tausenden Leuten.

translation.en: It looks so cool.
This is what it's like filming a documentary.
translation.de: So ist es, eine Doku zu drehen.

translation.en: Here we go.
I'm not ready to give this to Scott.
translation.de: Ich kann das Scott noch nicht geben.

translation.en: [man] He's not here.
It all stems from when I met him, and he had these cool sunglasses on.
translation.de: Als ich ihn kennenlernte, trug er diese coole Sonnenbrille.

translation.en: He said, "If you had a number one single, I'll give them to you."
translation.de: Er sagte: "Schreib einen Hit -und du kriegst sie." -Ja.

translation.en: The first thing we did together went number one.
translation.de: Unsere erste Single, kam auf Platz eins.

translation.en: It needs another melody.
Yeah, it's just, like...
How's that?
[Scott] Got it?
In my room, there's this thing
translation.de: Ich habe eine Tafel im Zimmer,

translation.en: that has the number of shows that we're on and where we are.
translation.de: die mir sagt, welches Konzert ansteht.

translation.en: Today it's at number eight, Copenhagen,
translation.de: Heute ist es das achte, Kopenhagen.

translation.en: and it made me think we're not even close to 100.
But it also said Cologne, not Copenhagen.
-We're in Cologne. -[Shawn] It said Cologne.
translation.de: Da stand "Köln", nicht "Kopenhagen". Es war Köln. Es hätte auch Kopenhagen sein können.

translation.en: -Actually, it might have said Copenhagen. -[all laughing]
translation.de: Es war Köln. Es hätte auch Kopenhagen sein können.

translation.en: But I want us to always keep in mind that this is very special.
translation.de: Ich will, dass wir jeden Abend als besonders ansehen.

translation.en: I'll say it, I know it'll get annoying,
translation.de: Ich weiß, das wird bald nerven,

translation.en: but it truly is so special. What we get to do is magical.
translation.de: aber was wir hier tun dürfen, ist magisch.

translation.en: Everyone in there, it's their first time seeing it,
translation.de: Für die da drin ist es das erste Mal,

translation.en: every single time.
-No matter if it's show one or show 99. -That's right.
It's their first time seeing it, it's special, so thanks. Let's do it.
translation.de: Es ist ihr erstes Mal, also danke. Los geht's.

translation.en: -Beautiful. -Let's do it.
Everybody jump!
[Shawn] I used to look at so many of my idols and be like, "How can you ever be that?
translation.de: Ich sah mir meine Idole an und dachte, so werde ich nie sein können.

translation.en: They were born legendary."
translation.de: Dass sie als Legenden geboren wurden.

translation.en: That's just not the truth.
[Shawn] People are like, "What would you be doing if this didn't happen?"
translation.de: "Was würde ich tun, wenn das nie passiert wäre?"

translation.en: I feel puzzled by that question,
because I feel like this is what I was going to do.
translation.de: Ich hatte schon immer diesen Traum.

translation.en: I'm in the Q&A yesterday.
This girl goes, "How do I be a songwriter like you?"
translation.de: fragt mich ein Mädchen: "Wie werde ich Songschreiberin?"

translation.en: I immediately thought about saying that to my dad,
translation.de: Ich sagte einst zu meinem Vater:

translation.en: "I wanna be a songwriter." He goes, "Can you write songs?"
translation.de: "Ich will Songs schreiben." Er fragte: "Kannst du das?"

translation.en: I said, "I don't know." He goes, "Write one."
I sat in my room and I played guitar for seven hours.
translation.de: Ich saß sieben Stunden an meiner Gitarre,

translation.en: My hands bled. I'd play again and get better, and I'd practice.
translation.de: meine Finger bluteten, ich wurde besser, übte weiter. Nicht jeder muss das gleich so ernst nehmen.

translation.en: And I'm not saying everyone has to be so Olympic athlete about it.
translation.de: übte weiter. Nicht jeder muss das gleich so ernst nehmen.

translation.en: I said that to her. I was like, "Stop sitting here thinking about it.
You are a songwriter. Now, go write songs."
translation.de: Du bist Songschreiberin. Geh Songs schreiben. "

translation.en: You don't hear songs that say,
"You're just too good to be true. Can't take my eyes off of you."
translation.de: -"Du bist zu gut, um wahr zu sein." -Stimmt.

translation.en: Even, like, those trumpets going... [imitating trumpets]
Like, all that trumpet stuff is really cool, right?
translation.de: Die Trompeten sind echt cool, oder?

translation.en: Feels, like, so, like, grandiose.
There's something about that I think about when it comes to the next album.
translation.de: Das möchte ich in meinem nächsten Album.

translation.en: Something about, like, that, like...
feeling, that, like, all-around, like, overdose of love.
♪ Here I sleep in London ♪ ♪ 'Cause I could spend A hundred days in-- ♪
Could you go, "Counting back from 100, so I can fall asleep faster"?
translation.de: Vielleicht: "Ich zähle von 100 runter, um schneller einzuschlafen"?

translation.en: -That's cool. -Yeah.
I was feeling like a...
[Scott] Love the echo after "Hello, hello."
[Scott] ♪ Head down on the pillow ♪
"All I have to do."
[man] Yeah.
It sounds better without.
-[man 1] Without? -[man 2] Sounds better.
Again.
Okay, George, punch me on "Close my eyes".
It's pretty cool,
translation.de: Echt cool. Sie mietet eine Wohnung im West Village,

translation.en: she rents an apartment in West Village, so we're staying there,
translation.de: Echt cool. Sie mietet eine Wohnung im West Village, dort wohnen wir.

translation.en: We wake up in the morning, like, "This is fucked."
translation.de: Morgens wachen wir auf und sagen: "Das ist absurd."

translation.en: And we have to wake up and both separately get in SUVs to head to the same place.
translation.de: Wir müssen in separaten SUVs zum selben Ort fahren.

translation.en: -[man] Yeah. -It's pretty cool.
I'm like, "I gotta leave at 8:30." She's like, "Me too."
translation.de: "Ich muss um 8.30 Uhr los." Sie sagt: "Ich auch."

translation.en: It's almost like living a taste of a normal life
translation.de: Es ist fast wie ein normales Leben

translation.en: in the least normal-life way.
translation.de: auf die unnormalste Art und Weise.

translation.en: Getting all my clothes on and running to the café for an Americano.
translation.de: Ich ziehe mich an, hole mir einen Americano im Café,

translation.en: Then you guys pulled up, and I was like, "Right, we're going to work."
translation.de: dann kamt ihr, und ich dachte: "Ok, an die Arbeit."

translation.en: -[man] How you doing? -Good, how are you?
We go this way.
So, when I step this way, what do I do with my arm?
translation.de: Und was mache ich mit meinem Arm?

translation.en: Boom. So this hand, when you step over... You step over here, boom.
translation.de: Zack. Die Hand, wenn du hierhin gehst. Hierhin, zack.

translation.en: -You look back... -Love that.
-So-- -Okay, got it.
-You're going to the other side. -No.
-All your weight is here. -Yep.
And then, you know about the outside edge...
This side?
[woman] Yeah, making sure that...
Okay. Super cozy.
-Super cozy. -Yeah.
[kisses] I love you.
-Do you know that? -I know.
translation.de: Weißt du das? Ich weiß es.

translation.en: [man 1] Thank you, everyone, good to go. Places. Let's start rehearsal, please.
translation.de: Ok, los geht's. Auf die Plätze. Fangen wir an, zu proben.

translation.en: [man 2] We're ready to roll when you folks are ready.
translation.de: Wir sind bereit, wenn ihr es seid.

translation.en: [Shawn] Camila, she was in Fifth Harmony, and we were both opening.
translation.de: Camila war Teil von Fifth Harmony und wir beide eröffneten.

translation.en: [chuckles] My very first tour ever.
And she was the act after me.
I was first in the lineup,
with the shortest set, and then they went on.
translation.de: mit dem kürzesten Set. Dann kamen sie.

translation.en: Five years ago, man.
[Cabello] He was so...
super hyper-focused on what he was doing. I never saw him the whole tour.
translation.de: …konzentriert. Ich sah ihn quasi nie auf dieser Tour.

translation.en: He was constantly in and out of his bus, playing guitar, writing songs with Geoff.
translation.de: Er war ständig in seinem Bus, spielte Gitarre, schrieb Songs mit Geoff.

translation.en: I thought he was cute, but I was like,
translation.de: Ich fand ihn süß, aber ich dachte:

translation.en: "He's... He's doing other stuff, so whatever."
translation.de: "Er hat andere Dinge im Kopf, also egal."

translation.en: And then, I guess it must have been about four or five years ago,
translation.de: Es muss vor vier, fünf Jahren gewesen sein.

translation.en: we were backstage at this Taylor Swift show.
I went to his dressing room to say hi.
translation.de: Ich ging in seine Garderobe, um Hallo zu sagen.

translation.en: And we, like, started writing this song.
translation.de: Und wir fingen an, diesen Song zu schreiben.

translation.en: And then after that, we, like, spent a lot of time with each other
translation.de: Danach verbrachten wir viel Zeit zusammen,

translation.en: because we had the song together
and we did a whole Jingle Ball tour together.
And that's really when the fucking saga started.
translation.de: Da fing die ganze Geschichte an.

translation.en: I really liked him.
I guess he liked me, but...
I don't really know. [laughs]
[Shawn] For the past four years,
just being friends and not seeing each other very often
translation.de: waren wir nur Freunde und sahen uns kaum.

translation.en: to finally being able to be together,
she was always there to look out for me as a human being.
translation.de: Sie war immer für mich da.

translation.en: She's got my back, and I think that's what your partner's for.
translation.de: Sie stärkt mir den Rücken. Dafür sind Partner da.

translation.en: We're in New York, and my song comes on the radio or something,
translation.de: Wir sind in New York und mein Song läuft im Radio.

translation.en: and the fact comes up that it's about her.
And I'm like, "Yeah, it's about you. Everything's about you.
translation.de: Ich sage: "Ja, es geht um dich. Das tut es immer.

translation.en: They've always been about you."
She goes, "What do you mean?" I'm like, "They're all about you.
translation.de: Sie fragt: "Was?" Ich sage: "Es handelt von dir.

translation.en: Like, every song I ever wrote."
And I'm rhyming off the songs like, "Treat You Better," all these songs.
translation.de: Ich zähle die Songs auf wie "Treat You Better".

translation.en: She's like, "Oh, my God." She literally had no idea.
translation.de: Sie sagt: "Oh mein Gott." Sie hatte keine Ahnung.

translation.en: This whole time, I thought she, like, knew.
I don't think I'll be able to write songs that really do it justice,
translation.de: Ich glaube, kein Lied, das ich schreibe,

translation.en: that can really capture the things and the feelings with her.
translation.de: kann den Gefühlen zu ihr gerecht werden.

translation.en: I think it's like when you see a moon or stars
translation.de: Es ist, als würde man den Mond oder die Sterne

translation.en: and you try to take a photo of it with your iPhone,
and then you just can't, it just doesn't look good.
translation.de: Es geht nicht. Es sieht nicht gut aus.

translation.en: And you're like, "It's not supposed to be captured." You know?
translation.de: So etwas kann man nicht einfangen. Verstehst du?

translation.en: It's just supposed to be for us.
[Cabello] Want to do it again for fun, stuff like that?
translation.de: -Willst du noch mal? -Ja! Spiel etwas rum, um locker zu werden.

translation.en: Play around just to get loose.
translation.de: Spiel etwas rum, um locker zu werden.

translation.en: -Yeah, yeah. -Yeah, yeah.
Okay. Good. Let's sing another song.
translation.de: Ok. Gut. Singen wir noch ein Lied.

translation.en: What's a song for fun? Literally, any song, but ours.
translation.de: Nur zum Spaß. Irgendeines außer unseres.

translation.en: ♪ It's not a silly little moment ♪ Fuck, yeah.
Shawn! Shawn, right here for me, man. Shawn!
Shawn, right here!
Shawn, one more here.
Oh, my God!
[man] It's insane. That was insane!
translation.de: Es ist irre. Das war irre!

translation.en: That was a really calm red carpet.
translation.de: Das war ein ruhiger roter Teppich.

translation.en: [laughs] I'm serious.
-[man] That was calm? -That was calm, dude.
translation.de: Das war ruhig? Das war ruhig.

translation.en: [Cabello] Wait, my, uh... My shoe! My shoe!
Oh, no!
My shoe.
[Shawn] Is there a proper way to do this? I swear, I'm gonna tie a double knot.
translation.de: Ist das richtig so? Wir brauchen einen Doppelknoten.

translation.en: [woman] Who's ready?
Can I have water?
Come on, it's time, let's go.
[Shawn] At this moment in time, during the summer of whatever you want to name this summer,
translation.de: In diesem Sommer, wie auch immer man ihn nennen mag,

translation.en: during "Señorita" and "If I Can't Have You"...
translation.de: der von "Señorita" und "If I Can't Have You"…

translation.en: Camila and I are staying in an apartment in NYC for the very first time alone.
translation.de: …sind Camila und ich zum ersten Mal allein in einer Wohnung in New York.

translation.en: And making eggs and trying to figure out how to use a Keurig.
translation.de: Wir kochen Eier und kämpfen mit der Kaffeemaschine.

translation.en: Normal things, you know?
This is really cool, to just be, like, a 21-year-old guy.
translation.de: Es ist echt cool, einfach nur 21 zu sein.

translation.en: And getting older...
That's happening for me too.
[man] Give it up for Shawn Mendes!
Camila Cabello, everybody!
[Shawn] I'm nervous.
Yeah, I feel anxious to go home right now.
translation.de: Ich habe Angst, nach Hause zu kommen.

translation.en: [man] How long has it been?
Three and half months.
It's a long time.
I'm excited to have a couple days off and be with friends and family.
translation.de: Ich freue mich auf freie Tage mit Freunden und Familie.

translation.en: Yeah. So excited.
I'm so lucky to have a friend like Brian.
translation.de: Ich habe so ein Glück mit Brian.

translation.en: He loves them anyway.
He works hard at keeping me in the real world.
translation.de: Er tut alles, damit ich nicht abhebe.

translation.en: If we had our own FIFA cards, you'd probably have--
translation.de: Gäbe es FIFA-Karten von uns, hättest du…

translation.en: -I'd have a high rating. -You'd probably be 76 passing,
translation.de: Viele Punkte. Du hättest 76 Pässe und ich 82.

translation.en: -I'd be 82. -Not a chance.
-I'd be rated a 93, you'd be rated an 87. -[snorts, laughs]
What's Ronaldo?
Ronaldo? I think Ronaldo's a 94.
-Yeah, I'm a 93. -[both laugh]
Without him, I don't know, I'd probably be, like, pretty crazy.
translation.de: Ohne ihn wäre ich vermutlich ziemlich abgedreht.

translation.en: Can you match my tone? That's my question.
[flatly] ♪ Yeah ♪
♪ Yeah ♪
♪ Yeah ♪
[Shawn] He just connects me with friends from home.
translation.de: Er bringt mich mit Freunden zusammen.

translation.en: I'm probably closer with my friends from home now than ever.
translation.de: Ich bin meinen Freunden daheim näher als zuvor.

translation.en: -Oh! -They were all supporting me
from the first time "Life of the Party" came out,
and now we're here together.
I want them to look around and be proud of it
translation.de: Ich will, dass sie stolz sind.

translation.en: and be like, "This is just as much ours as it is his."
translation.de: Dass sie sagen: "Das gehört genauso uns wie ihm."

translation.en: "Look, guys, we made it.
How beautiful is this?"
All right, bedroom. You did me great. Thanks.
I'll see you next time.
Thank God I'm leaving you.
Double guitar.
Let's go, bro.
Good to see you, man.
-Good to see you, welcome back. -Thank you.
You rock! You rock! You rock!
Welcome.
-It's been unlocked for three months. -[Brian laughs]
Let's go.
Welcome to my cozy house! It smells great in here.
translation.de: Willkommen bei mir. Es riecht toll hier.

translation.en: Okay, everything seems right.
How's your room, Brian? Seems right?
translation.de: Wie ist dein Zimmer, Brian? Ok?

translation.en: [Brian] Checks out.
[Shawn] Everything checks out?
[Brian] Oh, yeah.
An alarm!
Wow, the worst shit. [laughs]
Hasn't been home for so long.
[Shawn] This view is, like, the best view I have ever seen in Toronto.
translation.de: Das ist die beste Aussicht in Toronto.

translation.en: Except for them building this gross thing. What is that?
translation.de: Bis auf das hässliche Teil. Was ist das?

translation.en: Oh, my God, they're building a mall or something.
translation.de: Die bauen ein Einkaufszentrum oder so.

translation.en: This is pretty cool, eh? Rogers Centre?
[Brian] You can see it from here.
You can see the Rogers Centre from my apartment.
I can see it from my bedroom window when I wake up in the morning.
translation.de: Ich sehe es vom Bett aus, wenn ich aufwache.

translation.en: That's kind of insane to think about that I'm playing there.
Damn.
[Shawn] Hello, Mom.
-How's it going? -Good, we're just headed down.
Okay, I'm just trying to... 'Cause I spoke to Amy,
translation.de: Ok, ich versuche… Ich habe mit Amy gesprochen,

translation.en: the coordinator following you, but she wasn't sure
translation.de: der Koordinatorin. Sie war nicht sicher,

translation.en: if you were going to Whitby to get Aaliyah.
translation.de: ob du Aaliyah in Whitby abholst.

translation.en: I'm headed to pick her up. I'm 30 minutes from her.
translation.de: Ja, tue ich. Ich bin in 30 Minuten dort.

translation.en: All right, babe. See you soon.
What up!
Hey.
-My daughter's a big fan of yours. -[laughs]
You wanna flip that on selfie mode?
Tell your daughter hi.
-Can you say hi? Her name is Berina. -Berina, I love you.
translation.de: Grüßt du sie? Sie heißt Berina. Berina, ich liebe dich.

translation.en: -Thanks, buddy. -Yeah, man.
Canadian love right there.
Hello.
You had a first day of school today. That's why you're in your outfit.
translation.de: Es war dein erster Schultag. -Ja. -Darum die Uniform.

translation.en: -I like wearing this all the time. -I didn't think about it.
translation.de: Die trage ich zum Spaß. Stimmt, ich vergaß.

translation.en: Look at this shit.
Man, this is our... This is our field.
Brian and I fully, 100% climbed up that.
translation.de: Brian und ich sind da hochgeklettert.

translation.en: Swear to God.
He told you?

I asked him if he wanted to be famous one day,

He was like, "No, I don't want to be famous. It seems awful."

and you, like, were disgusted by the idea.

You said it all the time.

translation.en: so I was like, "You're gonna become famous."
You were, like, "I don't wanna be famous." I don't remember that.

translation.en: We talked about it all the time in the office.

I used to...
This door here...
We'd finish school off...
and everyone would come rushing down
and just hang outside on this front thing on a Friday.

So stupid.
So stupid.

My car is driving itself right now.

translation.en: We both got so caught up in it.
We looked at each other and were like, "I don't feel good."
translation.de: Wir sahen uns an und ich sagte: "Mir ist unwohl."

translation.en: 'Cause we were taken right back to that insecure, unsure 15-year-old.
translation.de: Es war, als wären wir wieder 15 und voller Unsicherheit.

translation.en: And I just felt like, "Wow, she really understands that feeling."
translation.de: Ich dachte: "Wow. Sie versteht mich echt."

translation.de: Wir sagten: "Wir fühlen uns komisch, oder?"

And I'm like, "I'm so happy you know why,
translation.de: Und ich: "Wie gut, dass du es verstehst,

translation.en: 'cause I don't know if I could explain this well to others."
translation.de: weil ich es nur schlecht erklären könnte."

translation.en: Sounds like your heart.
Feels like my heart, yeah.
Yeah, I went through a phase where I used to write this over and over.

translation.en: "I control my brain with my voice."
"I sing with no tension."
"My chest voice is strong and healthy."

two weeks before we put Rogers Centre on sale, November 24th, 2018.

-[both] "I sold out the Rogers Centre." -[chuckles]

Jesus Christ.

[chuckles] This is crazy.
It's kind of big.

Does the stage look small here?

translation.en: Look at it.
I'm looking at the Rogers Centre, and for the first time I'm getting nervous.

This isn't like...
playing your biggest show of all time. It's more like,
"This is incredible. We're in his hometown.

translation.en: It's also in the biggest stadium in the country."

translation.en: I feel crazy.
Fuck!
Sing along!
Here we go!

And it feels completely surreal.

It's kind of pure magic from start to finish.

I love you so much. Thank you.

translation.en: Toronto, I love you so much with all of my heart. Thank you.

kind of just being like, "Okay, whatever comes, comes."

Two songs, basically.

"Make sure you say you're grateful," because I am. In the biggest way, I'm so grateful.

You're gonna do a tree at my house?
Yeah. I'll do your tree, but nothing else.

And, like, really, like, small-town thoughts.

translation.en: You know, those things are like...
I think I miss that a little bit right now.
It's pretty intense all the time.
I really think about that a lot.
If I tell the world that I'm just a normal human,
translation.de: Wenn ich verrate, dass ich nur ein Mensch bin,

translation.en: are they going to stop coming to the shows

translation.en: is all the craziness going to stop?

translation.en: Then you're like, "Maybe I shouldn't tell them.
I should keep the trick up.
Maybe I should pretend that I'm Superman for a little bit longer."

translation.en: Just played.
Writing a little message on Instagram.
"Feeling overwhelmed by life today.
I'm right here right now, and it's beautiful.
translation.de: Ich bin jetzt hier und es ist so schön."

translation.en: And it's so beautiful.
And it's so beautiful."
That's all I got for you.
I've been trying to figure it out since it started, you know,
and I have a billion different ways...
People'll be like, "Why'd this happen to you?" I have a lot of logical answers,
translation.de: Ich habe viele logische Antworten auf die Frage, warum es geschah,

translation.en: but none of them are satisfying, you know?
I'm constantly warming up,
and I'm constantly checking my voice out of fear of the fact that...

I wonder if the band's out there.

-Hi. -This experience has been so good.
Oh, my God! Oh, my God!
-I can't speak. -It's okay.
It's so nice to meet you.
Yeah.
You make me feel connected to you and connected to people around me,

translation.en: and I'm just so thankful, and I...
-Oh, my God. -[laughs]
Should we take a photo?
[Shawn] When you're pulling up to a hotel in a country you've never been to,
translation.de: Wenn man in einem fremden Land vor einem Hotel hält, und dort 1000 Leute auf einen warten…

translation.en: and there's 1,000 people outside waiting for you...

translation.en: no matter how many times you go through that, it feels...

translation.en: like a dream.
I don't know if that's ever going to feel normal.
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht, ob man sich je daran gewöhnt.

translation.en: I don't know if that's supposed to feel normal.

translation.en: I love you so much, thank you!
Thank you so much!
Thank you, Shawn! I love you!
I love you so much.
What's up, guys?
We're, uh... We're in Brazil on the last leg of the tour.
translation.de: Wir sind in Brasilien, am Ende der Tour.

[clears throat] ...pretty sick today.
The day before I'm gonna play two stadiums in São Paulo.

translation.en: But you know what? It's okay because...
I watched some Kobe Bryant YouTube videos and I feel great.
translation.de: …ich sah mir Kobe-Bryant-Videos an und fühle mich super.

translation.en: -'Cause I had swelling on my right cord. -Yeah, that's swollen.
Just wanna check. I have volume if I wanna bring it back.
translation.de: Ich frage nur. Aber ich kann laut singen.

translation.en: -Okay, you'll just-- -But I just am choosing not to. Yeah.
translation.de: -Ok, aber… -Aber ich tue es nicht. Ja.

translation.en: Yeah.
Thank you so much.

It's going. It's going.
Just listen to this. This is...
translation.de: Hör dir das an. Das ist…

translation.en: I don't know. It makes me very nervous.
What time is it there right now?
translation.de: Wie spät ist es bei dir?

translation.en: And what time is the show?
I don't think it's a good idea. That's my feeling.
translation.de: Ich glaube, das ist keine gute Idee.

translation.en: I want to bring you to Cez,
just so you can say to him, based off of...
You're saying, based off of how my voice sounds--
Based off of that, you shouldn't even be talking.
I'm nervous that you'll hurt yourself, and then...

translation.en: Can you hear me?
Yeah.
Yeah, so we FaceTimed Nasseri in while we were in with the other doc.
translation.de: Nasseri war per Videocall mit beim Arzt.

translation.en: So he was there looking at all the videos, all the scopes.
Everything was, like, through him.
Yeah, I completely trust what you're saying, and agree.
translation.de: Ja, ich vertraue dir voll und ganz und stimme zu.

translation.en: The truth is in the singing.
Yeah, a hundred percent. [chuckles]
It's there or it's not. Yeah, totally.
Okay, if you're saying it's detrimental to warm up right now,
translation.de: Wenn du sagst, er sollte sich nicht aufwärmen,

translation.en: then let's not do that.
All good. Thanks, Eric.
All right. Bye, dude.
Just so you know, I've made it very aware that we have 11 more shows after this.

translation.en: it'll be to the detriment of those.

I'm going to merge a call with Eric,

No.
-Five hours to show time, Cez? -Yeah, we're 30 minutes to doors.

translation.en: -Thirty minutes to doors? Why so early? -'Cause it's a stadium.

translation.en: Right.
[Nasseri] I was just gonna say, we've seen people who have said,
translation.de: Ich kenne Leute, die gesagt haben:

translation.en: "I'm just going to muscle through it",
and they completely hemorrhaged, and then they needed surgery.
I mean, I know it's a really overwhelming thing to cancel, but--
translation.de: Ich weiß, es ist schwer, das abzusagen, aber…

translation.en: [Vetro] I'm gonna step in now and tell you
you have really no voice, we have 11 shows to go.

translation.en: For an outside stadium,
you're gonna hurt yourself for the next 11.

translation.en: -Yeah. -[Vetro] What do you think, Shawn?
I don't know. I'm not in a good place to make any decisions.

translation.en: [Darke] He's overwhelmed.
And just to be clear, both of you are saying
translation.de: Noch mal Klartext, ihr sagt beide,

translation.en: we should cancel the show, right?
-[Vetro] We're unanimous on that. -[Darke] Okay.
Well, we'll get into it this side, and, um...
Yeah, we'll let you know on the final decision,
translation.de: und sagen euch noch mal Bescheid.

translation.en: and then we'll update you.
-[Vetro] Okay. -All right. Thanks, dudes.
Take care.
See you in a bit, all right?
[in Portuguese] Canceled!
"It breaks my heart to do this,
but my doctors told me I cannot perform tonight,
translation.de: aber die Ärzte sagen, dieser Auftritt

translation.en: or it would risk long-term damage to my voice.
I love you all, and I apologize from the bottom of my heart.
translation.de: Ich liebe euch. Es tut mir wirklich leid.

translation.en: I wish I could be there on stage tonight.
I'll make it up to you the next time I'm there."
translation.de: Ich verspreche, ich mache es wieder gut."

translation.en: -[sighs, sniffles] -[Karen] Aw, babe, I'm sorry.
It was a great show last night.
They got to see you there, babe. It wasn't like...

translation.en: you haven't been there. They've seen you.

translation.en: They've experienced it.
It wasn't like you've never been there.
You told me you were sick. You had a bad voice,
but you never told me it was that serious.
translation.de: nicht, dass es so ernst ist.

translation.en: It's fine. You're fine. It's not the end of the world, babe.
translation.de: Schon gut. Das ist nicht das Ende der Welt.

translation.en: Take a breath.
[whispering] Yeah.
You can't help it.
Love you.
You too, babe. I love you more.
You're good. You've got it.
You've got this, babe.
You know what, the fans are gonna understand.
Yeah, said you were on vocal rest. I didn't realize it was that serious.
translation.de: Stimmruhe? Ich wusste nicht, wie ernst es ist.

translation.en: [Shawn] It's so hard in that moment to be like, "What can you do?"
translation.de: Es ist schwer, die Situation zu akzeptieren,

translation.en: because there's 40,000 people outside.
And you just feel...
the deepest pit in your stomach.
Wow, it changes the mood real fast.
[Shawn] When we got to the hotel
and I was up in my room, I was so upset with the situation,
and then I heard chanting from outside.
translation.de: Dann hörte ich Rufe von draußen.

translation.en: I opened up my window, and there was 2,000 people in the streets chanting.
translation.de: Ich öffnete das Fenster, und da waren 2000 Leute auf der Straße.

translation.en: And that is, like, beautiful.
Right then, I was like, "I can't even...
I can't even believe how good people are."
Just a really beautiful thing.
[automated female voice] I was upset for a while.
I sat there in the stadium knowing I was the reason it was all falling apart.
translation.de: Ich war der Grund dafür, dass das Konzert abgesagt wurde.

translation.en: The hardest part is feeling like I let them down.
translation.de: Menschen zu enttäuschen ist das Schlimmste.

translation.en: These next 10 years are when everything I do is going full speed.
translation.de: Die nächsten zehn Jahre werden meine intensivsten sein.

translation.en: It's like an athlete in their prime.
I have to keep going.
[Shawn] The heaviness of the tour
made me want to flip things around and become more positive, you know?
translation.de: weckten in mir den Wunsch, positiver zu sein.

translation.en: And I'm writing about anxiety more as...
translation.de: Ich schreibe über Angst mehr als…

translation.en: a companion I have to live with and less of an enemy that I'm trying to resist.
translation.de: …einen Begleiter, mit dem ich leben muss, statt als einen Feind.

translation.en: Okay, can we just double that, then?
-Double that, I think it's cool. -Cool.
I'm really excited to sing these songs on tour.
translation.de: Ich freue mich, die auf Tour zu singen.

translation.en: All this stuff is so playable, in the best way.
translation.de: Die sind alle so gut spielbar.

translation.en: I want another Juno to come in...
behind it there, like...
And then another third one to come in there,
like, kind of, a little rise.
When you start an album, you don't really know what to expect.
translation.de: Zu Beginn eines Albums ist alles offen.

translation.en: So you just have to dive in and see what happens.
translation.de: Du musst es auf dich zukommen lassen.

translation.en: Some sort of little thing in the back there.
-You felt that there? -Little pause? Yeah.
Hear it now.
How are the horns sounding right now?
Is this how we always assembled?
-It's our thing. -Okay, cool.
[man 1] Good times.
It's our last show.
-It's our last show. -[man 2] And it's sold out.
Sold out, baby.
Why do you look so cool?
translation.de: Warum siehst du so cool aus?

translation.en: -[Aaliyah] How are you? -Fine!
-Hey! -How you feeling?
-How's it going? -Mom on FaceTime?
-She is. -Hi, Mom!
I'll flip it around.
[Shawn] A hundred and five shows...
The last year of my life has been this tour, and...
translation.de: Das war das letzte Jahr meines Lebens.

translation.en: it's bittersweet.
It's more sweet than bitter, to be honest.
This makes me so happy, when I come into the venue,
translation.de: Es macht mich so glücklich, wenn ich reinkomme,

translation.en: and it's been weeks, and all of a sudden,
the "Manny" thing pops up, and I'm like, "He's coming to town."
translation.de: steht da plötzlich "Manny", und ich weiß, dass er kommt.

translation.en: ♪ Ooh, a storm is threatening ♪
♪ My very life today ♪
♪ If I don't get some shelter ♪
♪ Ooh, yeah, I'm gonna fade away ♪
translation.de: Ja, dann werde ich nicht mehr sein

translation.en: ♪ War, children ♪
♪ It's just a shot away ♪
-Hey, bro. -Hey, brother.
[Shawn] At the end of this tour, I'm realizing
translation.de: Am Ende der Tour wird mir klar:

translation.en: this is something I want to do for the rest of my life.
translation.de: Das will ich für den Rest meines Lebens tun.

translation.en: How do you get to the end of a very, very intense year...
translation.de: Wie kann man am Ende eines langen Jahres…

translation.en: and want to do it all over again?
At the end of this tour,
I wish I had some profound thing to say about all this, but...
translation.de: ich könnte jetzt etwas Tiefgründiges sagen, aber…

translation.en: you know what the truth is?
You walk up on the stage and you look around and you think...
translation.de: Du gehst auf die Bühne und denkst…

translation.en: "I'm just a guy who really loves music. Time to let go."
translation.de: "Ich bin nur ein Kerl, der Musik liebt. Zeit, loszulassen."

translation.en: New York!
[Shawn] Until next time. We love you. Thank you so much for having us.
translation.de: Bis zum nächsten Mal. Wir lieben euch. Vielen Dank!

translation.en: Let me record that.
